import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Container,Wrap,DropDown,Grid} from './style' const Accordion = ({products,total,message}) => { const [isClicked, setIsClicked] = useState(false) const toggle = () =>{ setIsClicked(!isClicked) } return (

{products.length} {products.length >1 ? ("products") : ("product")}

{total}$

{isClicked ? ("-") : ("+")}

 ) } export default Accordion
